price: We watunganyije buri kintu yaremye, akanatangira iremwa ry’umuntu utari uriho, amuremye mu ibumba.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحۡسَنَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلۡقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aḥsana kulla shayin khalaqahu wabada-a khalqa al-insāni min ṭīnin
